abstract: Authorities in Bahrain seize explosives and bomb-making materials they believe were planned for use in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia by Iran.
lead_paragraph: The methods used to assemble the explosives bore “clear similarities” to those of what he called proxy groups of Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Bahrain: Explosives Seized, Police Say
